Name: Screen VR
About the game: Screen VR has been built from the ground up with a focus on realistic visceral and satisfying fully destructible heads. Attack any NPC in the game and watch as their head burst into a fountain of gore and destruction. Unique everytime and just what VR has been waiting for. Screen VR also has a 10 point dismemberment system developed from day one with VR performance limitations in mind, for those times when killing someone is just not enough. Reactive depending on angle of attack and power of weapon used. Watch limbs dislodge from the main torso in an endless number of unique combinations. A truly unique death system among today's VR games.
